column2: Total No. Persons Under Trial Including those from Previous Year (Col.2)
column3: No. of persons whose - Cases Compounded or Withdrawn (Col.3)
column4: No. of persons whose - Trial Completed (Col.4)
column5: No. of persons whose - Trial Remained Pending at the end of the year (Col.5)
column7: Percentage of Persons Whose Trials Remained Pending (Col.7) = (Col.6 × 100 / Col.3)
column8: Percentage of Persons Convicted To Trials Completed (Col.8) = (Col.7 × 100 / Col.5)
